leads.title: Looking for a performance marketing agency for Meta + Google
leads.summary: D2C brand needs help scaling paid social + search. ASAP.
leads.recommended_message: Hey — saw your post about looking for a performance marketing partner. Quick Q: what’s your current monthly spend + primary KPI (ROAS/CAC)? If useful, I can share a 7‑day audit + a 30‑day scale plan.

leads.title: Need help improving ROAS for Shopify
leads.summary: Shopify store owner exploring help with paid ads; budget unclear.
leads.recommended_message: Hey — happy to help. What’s your AOV and top channel today (Meta/Google)? If you share spend + ROAS, I’ll suggest 3 quick wins.

leads.title: Hiring performance marketing manager
leads.summary: Employment post, not agency buyer intent.
